body_html: @girving I encountered the same problem just like you guys. it came to me that the exceptions do not occur when the system is under heavy load. so either this Eigen package is assuming cuda initialization order without a guarantee or nvidia is changing their protocol.
body_text: @girving I encountered the same problem just like you guys. it came to me that the exceptions do not occur when the system is under heavy load. so either this Eigen package is assuming cuda initialization order without a guarantee or nvidia is changing their protocol.
body: @girving I encountered the same problem just like you guys. it came to me that the exceptions do not occur when the system is under heavy load. so either this Eigen package is assuming cuda initialization order without a guarantee or nvidia is changing their protocol.
